title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1225.48 - Use of parking areas conditioned upon payment of prescribed fees
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1225.48 - Use of parking areas conditioned upon payment of prescribed fees

State Regulations

No person shall park a vehicle within any vehicular
parking area except upon the payment of such parking fees and charges as the

Port Authority may prescribe. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1225.48

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
